gym_agx.tests.frenet_test.parameterized_helix(a=1, b=1, T=6.283185307179586)¶

Circular helix with radius a and slope b/a or pitch 2*pi*b :param a: radius :param b: slope factor b/a, or pitch factor 2*pi*b :param T: final value of t :returns state: points along helix
